thread.title: Telesta Therapeutics raises $28.3mm through private placement
thread.title_full: Telesta Therapeutics raises $28.3mm through private placement

title: Telesta Therapeutics raises $28.3mm through private placement
text:
Telesta Therapeutics raises $28.3mm through private placement Deal Date: Aug-01-2015 / Deal # 201530644 Executive Summary 
Telesta Therapeutics Inc. (developing MCNA (Mycobacterium phlei cell wall-nucleic acid complex) for non-muscle invasive bladder cancer) raised $28.3mm through the private sale of 109mm common shares at $0.26 (market average).Consonance Capital Investors purchased almost half of the shares (and now holds a 19.96% stake), and was joined by Boxer Capital (of Tavistock Life Sciences) and Omega Funds, along with members of Telesta's senior management team and board of directors.
